hero.subtitle: Game jam for high schoolers in 200+ cities

steps.step1: Sign up for a **Campfire** near you
steps.step2: Grab **friends** (or make new friends!) and __form a__ **team of 2-3**
steps.step3: Learn from **workshops**, enjoy __free food and merch!__

letter.paragraph1: Welcome to Hack Club's newest adventure. This winter we invite you to join us for Campfire, the world's biggest Game Jam happening simultaneously in 200 cities.
letter.paragraph2: Hack Club wants you to make a game this winter.
letter.paragraph3: Don't consider yourself a game dev? No problem - we have tons of online and in-person workshops for you to make your first game!
letter.paragraph4: This winter, we invite you to learn something new, make something you're really proud of, meet new friends, and go on an incredible adventure together.

footer.tagline: made with love by Hack Club & Open Sauce
footer.description: Hack Club is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit and network of 60k+ technical high schoolers. We believe you learn best by building so we're creating community and providing grants so you can make awesome projects. In the past few years, we've partnered with GitHub to run

questions.question: What is a game jam?
questions.answer: A game jam is an event where you build a game from scratch in a short time period! It's all about creativity, teamwork, and having fun while learning new skills.

questions.question: Am I eligible?
questions.answer: If you're a high schooler (or younger), you're eligible! No prior experience required - just bring your enthusiasm and willingness to learn.

questions.question: But I've never hacked before!
questions.answer: Perfect! Game jams are designed for beginners. You'll have workshops, mentors, and teammates to help you every step of the way.

questions.question: All this, for free?
questions.answer: Yes! Everything is completely free - venue, food, swag, workshops, and prizes. Hack Club covers all costs so you can focus on creating.

questions.question: What do I need to bring?
questions.answer: Just bring yourself, a laptop, charger, and any personal items you need. We'll provide food, drinks, and everything else!

questions.question: Can I become a volunteer
questions.answer: Yes! We're always looking for enthusiastic volunteers to help make the event amazing.

questions.question: What are the steps to volunteering?
questions.answer: Click the 'Apply to be a volunteer' button below and fill out the application form.

questions.question: Do we get free snacks?
questions.answer: Yes! Volunteers get free meals and snacks throughout the event.

questions.question: Do we get volunteer hours?
questions.answer: Absolutely! You'll receive a certificate with volunteer hours documented.

questions.question: Can I become a volunteer and participate as well?
questions.answer: Unfortunately, you can only choose one role to ensure quality participation.
